name: Independent Research in Criminology, Law and Society
description: Intended for Criminology, Law and Society Specialists and Majors who wish to explore a specific Criminology, Law and Society topic in depth. To enrol, a student must prepare a proposal form in consultation with a faculty supervisor and submit the signed form to the academic counsellor. Students may take a maximum of 2.0 credits of independent studies.
prerequisites: SOC205H5, SOC209H5, SOC221H5, SOC222H5, 3rd Year Standing, P.I.
